author: Marc Hedish
releaseNotes:
STABLE RELEASE â€” High-performance driver for APC Smart-UPS with Network Management Cards (NMC). Uses a deterministic Telnet lifecycle and transient in-memory context for sub-5-second telemetry without race conditions, stale state, or missed updates.
1.0.1.4 - Corrected emitEvent() and emitChangedEvent()
1.0.1.5 - Changed asynchronous delay when stale state variable is detected to blocking/synchronous to allow lazy-flushed update to complete before forcing refresh().
